description: Use ice-cream, triple-choc cookies and sweet berries to create this show-stopping ice-cream cake recipe. It's the perfect make-ahead dessert.
name: Blackberry, Vanilla & Cookie Ice-Cream Cake Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 L Connoisseur Classic Vanilla Gourmet Ice Cream
1 L Connoisseur Barossa Valley Merlot Blackberry & Cookie Gourmet Ice Cream

recipeInstructions.text: Spoon blackberry ice-cream over blackberries and, using back of a spoon, level surface. Freeze for 4 hours or until firm. Transfer cake to a plate or board. Serve topped with remaining drained blackberries.
